channel.title: admin on Under construction...
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Under construction...

item.description: I am an empirical researcher and my work is at the frontier between banking and other fields: banking with labor economics and banking with asset pricing. In particular, I have extensively researched bank behaviour in the OTC markets for swaps and bonds, the impact of bank funding constraints on the labor market, as well as the effects of non-conventional monetary policy on SMEs. Prior to my PhD, I was a consultant at Frontier Economics in London, where I specialized in regulatory issues and competition policy for financial services.
